name: Heart Seargery
details: Heart surgery can correct problems with the heart if other treatments haven't worked or can't be used.

name: Orthopedi Surgery
details: Orthopaedic surgery or orthopaedics, is the branch of surgery concerned  the musculoskeletal system.

name: Dentar Surgery
details: Dental surgery is any of a number of medical procedures that involve artificially modifying dentition.

name: Medicine
details: Medicine is the science managing the diagnosis, prognosis, prevention, treatment, palliation of their injury or disease, and promoting their health.

name: Cancer
details: The cancerous cells can invade and destroy surrounding healthy tissue, including organs.

name: Gynecology
details: Gynaecology or gynecology is the medical practice dealing with the health of the female reproductive system.
